body:
I think it would be necessary if this were to be run from setup.py. It's here that we choose between cmake and setup.py. Even though it's not currently an "integrated" test, I guess it could be in the future. I can take this out or leave it in, your choice.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/caffe2/build.sh#L199
